title: Steamed sea bass with a rice noodle salad
description: Delicious sea bass steamed with greens and a salad packed with oriental flavour.
ingredients: 2cm/1in knob fresh root ginger, thinly sliced
2 sticks lemongrass, bruised and chopped in half
4 spring onions, trimmed and thinly sliced
5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, roughly chopped
3 tbsp palm sugar (or substitute soft brown sugar)
